title: Divine Lakshmi Temple Haaram with Polki Diamonds and Emerald Accent
features: Intricately designed Lakshmi pendant with detailed Nakshi work depicting the Goddess seated in a lotus. Features graceful peacock motifs flanking the Goddess. The necklace chain is set with Polki diamonds, and finished with light yellow beads at the pendant bottom. The pendant is adorned with a Emerald Cabochon.
occasions: and festive occasions. Perfect for adding a touch of traditional elegance to any ensemble.
description: This Temple Haaram is a timeless piece of art. The combination of traditional Nakshi work, Polki diamonds, and vibrant gemstones creates a mesmerizing effect. The Lakshmi pendant is believed to bring prosperity and good fortune to the wearer, making it not just a beautiful piece of jewelry, but also a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability.
